name: Werewolf Online (itch) (ArjhanToteck)
description:
Werewolf is an online multiplayer text-based social deduction game based on the party game of the same name. Two factions, the werewolves and villagers try to eliminate each other.

More information as well as instructions are shown in game. Use your browser forward and back buttons to navigate between pages.

This game is open source, and the source can be found on GitHub.
